name: part_009
file: tmp_【#沙花叉クロヱ3D】シャチ出没注意【ホロライブ】 [MOekZ-g5qJQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Chloe Sakamata is playing a card game (High and Low) against an unseen opponent, likely Marine Houshou, and experiences various wins and losses.

subtitles.original: まりちゃんどっちにするのかな?
subtitles.english: What will Mari-chan choose?
It's a 7, a 7.
Eh, 7 is...

subtitles.original: ん? どっちのかな? ねえ、焦らさないで。
subtitles.english: Hmm? Which one will it be? Hey, don't tease me.

subtitles.original: 待って待って。あ、分かった分かった。
subtitles.english: Wait, wait. Oh, I see, I see.

subtitles.original: でも、でもさあ。あんま変わんないよ。
subtitles.english: But, but you know. It doesn't change much.

subtitles.original: どうするの?
subtitles.english: What are you going to do?

subtitles.original: え、どう... ローで行くの? ロー? ロー?
subtitles.english: Eh, how... Going with Low? Low? Low?

subtitles.original: 別に期待... そんな大差ないし。うん、そうだね。
subtitles.english: I'm not really expect... It's not much of a difference. Yeah, that's right.

subtitles.original: ローで。はい、分かった。
subtitles.english: With Low. Yes, I got it.

subtitles.original: いいよ。めくったら。どうぞどうぞ。
subtitles.english: Okay. Go ahead and flip it. Please, please.

subtitles.original: はいさあ。はあはあ。
subtitles.english: Here we go. Hahaha.

subtitles.original: ええー!
subtitles.english: Ehhh!

subtitles.original: えー!
subtitles.english: Eh!

subtitles.original: やだー! 目逸らさないで! やだー!
subtitles.english: Nooo! Don't look away! Nooo!

subtitles.original: ねえ、ずる。ずるだよ、それ。
subtitles.english: Hey, that's unfair. That's unfair.

subtitles.original: やだ。坂又の勝ちじゃん。
subtitles.english: No. It's Sakamata's win, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 次、次。次だよ。絶対当てるから。
subtitles.english: Next, next. It's next. I'll definitely get it right.

subtitles.original: 次まりちゃんのターン。どうぞ、めくって。
subtitles.english: Next is Mari-chan's turn. Go ahead, flip it.

subtitles.original: ねえ、焦らさないで。焦らさないで。早く早く。
subtitles.english: Hey, don't tease me. Don't tease me. Hurry, hurry.

subtitles.original: あー! 8かー!
subtitles.english: Ah! It's an 8!

subtitles.original: いやいや、もう、これは。でも、やっぱ。
subtitles.english: No, no, this is. But, as expected.

subtitles.original: 圧倒的に頭がいいので、坂又ちゃんは。
subtitles.english: Sakamata-chan is overwhelmingly smart, you see.

subtitles.original: ま、ローかな? ローだよね。ロー、ロー。絶対ローだわ。
subtitles.english: Well, Low, maybe? It's Low, right. Low, Low. It's definitely Low.

subtitles.original: でもね、坂又ね。運いいから絶対勝てるはずなんだよ。
subtitles.english: But you know, Sakamata is lucky, so I'm sure to win.

subtitles.original: マジで。あの、運で負けたことあんましないから。
subtitles.english: Seriously. I haven't really lost because of luck.

subtitles.original: ガチで。
subtitles.english: For real.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、行きますよ。
subtitles.english: Okay, here I go.

subtitles.original: はい!
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: あー! やったー! よかったー!
subtitles.english: Ah! I did it! I'm so glad!

subtitles.original: 今、頭バグってさ。え、1って最強だっけ? みたいになってた。
subtitles.english: My brain just glitched out. I was like, "Wait, is 1 the strongest?"

subtitles.original: やったー! 勝ち勝ち!
subtitles.english: I did it! Win, win!

subtitles.original: やったー、やったー。え、まりちゃん弱...
subtitles.english: Yay, yay. Eh, Mari-chan is weak...

subtitles.original: あ、見て見て。チップの量、これヤバくない?
subtitles.english: Oh, look, look. Isn't this amount of chips crazy?

subtitles.original: え、坂又、これ大富豪じゃん。
subtitles.english: Eh, Sakamata is a multi-millionaire now.

subtitles.original: このままちょっと。全勝ちしていきたいな。
subtitles.english: I want to keep going like this and win them all.

subtitles.original: よし。じゃあ、行きますか。
subtitles.english: Alright. Shall we go then?

subtitles.original: じゃあ、坂又が次親だからね。いくよ。
subtitles.english: Then, Sakamata will be the dealer next. Here I go.

subtitles.original: はい!
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: 10ですよ。
subtitles.english: It's a 10.

subtitles.original: どうします?
subtitles.english: What are you going to do?

subtitles.original: ねえー! やだー!
subtitles.english: Nooo! Nooo!

subtitles.original: まりちゃんのターンで全然いいよ。
subtitles.english: It's totally fine if it's Mari-chan's turn.

subtitles.original: いやいや、10ってさ。10ってちょっと高いから。
subtitles.english: No, no, 10 is. 10 is a bit high.

subtitles.original: やめて、やめて、やめてよ。
subtitles.english: Stop it, stop it, stop it.

subtitles.original: やめて、ローじゃないでしょ。やだ、やだ。
subtitles.english: Stop it, it's not Low, right? No, no.

subtitles.original: ちょっと返して、やだー。
subtitles.english: Give it back a bit, nooo.

subtitles.original: なんで? ひどいよー。もー。やだ、やだ。
subtitles.english: Why? You're mean. Jeez. No, no.

subtitles.original: 絶対坂又の勝ちなんだから。
subtitles.english: I'm definitely going to win.

subtitles.original: はあ! 坂又の勝ちじゃん。
subtitles.english: Haa! It's Sakamata's win.

subtitles.original: え、え、ねえ、煽ってた。
subtitles.english: Eh, eh, hey, you were taunting me.

subtitles.original: ねえ、煽ってた。くせに、負け負けの負けじゃん。
subtitles.english: Hey, you were taunting me. And yet, you lost, lost, lost.

subtitles.original: ねーねー、坂又強くない?
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, isn't Sakamata strong?

subtitles.original: え、これ何回目だっけ? 分かんなくなっちゃった。
subtitles.english: Eh, how many times has it been? I've lost track.

subtitles.original: 二回目?
subtitles.english: Second time?

subtitles.original: 見て見て、このさ、チップの山。
subtitles.english: Look, look at this pile of chips.

subtitles.original: 絶対坂又が負けるわけないね、こっから。
subtitles.english: There's no way Sakamata can lose from here.

subtitles.original: よし、よし。じゃあまりちゃんどうぞ、と。
subtitles.english: Good, good. Then Mari-chan, go ahead.

subtitles.original: え、これ勝ちじゃん。やったー。
subtitles.english: Eh, I win this. Yay.

subtitles.original: え、あ、ロー、ロー、ロー。
subtitles.english: Eh, ah, Low, Low, Low.

subtitles.original: ねえ、やめて、ここ外さないで。
subtitles.english: Hey, stop it, don't miss this.

subtitles.original: ロー、ロー、ロー。はい、めくって、めくって。
subtitles.english: Low, Low, Low. Okay, flip it, flip it.

subtitles.original: 早く、早く。
subtitles.english: Hurry, hurry.

subtitles.original: 早く、早く。どう? どう? どう? やったー!
subtitles.english: Hurry, hurry. How is it? How is it? How is it? Yay!

subtitles.original: 坂又ラッシュ! ねえ、なん、なん。よし、よし、よし。
subtitles.english: Sakamata rush! Hey, what, what. Good, good, good.

subtitles.original: イェー! 見てこのチップの山。イェー!
subtitles.english: Yay! Look at this pile of chips. Yay!

subtitles.original: これ、勝ちましたね。
subtitles.english: I've won this, haven't I?

subtitles.original: 勝ちが見えます。
subtitles.english: I can see the victory.

subtitles.original: よしよ、坂又が親のターンですよ。
subtitles.english: Alright, it's Sakamata's turn as the dealer.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、めくりますね。
subtitles.english: Well then, I'll flip it.

subtitles.original: いいかな? んんん。
subtitles.english: Ready? Hmmm.

subtitles.original: ほい!
subtitles.english: Hoi!

subtitles.original: 変えてもらえますか?
subtitles.english: Can I have it changed?

subtitles.original: 店長、なんかズルされてます。
subtitles.english: Manager, I'm being cheated somehow.

subtitles.original: 今。なんかやってます、この人。
subtitles.english: Right now. This person is doing something.

subtitles.original: ちょっとお、な、何ですか?
subtitles.english: Hey, what is it?

subtitles.original: あ、どっち? うえ?
subtitles.english: Ah, which one? Up?

subtitles.original: あ、ハイ。あ、ハイだって、みんな。
subtitles.english: Ah, High. Oh, she said High, everyone.

subtitles.original: ハイだって、ハイだって。じゃあハイで行きましょう、ハイで。
subtitles.english: She said High, she said High. Then let's go with High, with High.

subtitles.original: ハイだって。はい、はい、はい。イェー!
subtitles.english: She said High. High, High, High. Yay!

subtitles.original: ハイ、ハイ、ハイ。あ、聞いてます? ちょっと、お姉さん?
subtitles.english: High, High, High. Oh, are you listening? Hey, miss?

subtitles.original: ハイ、とおって。ハイ、とおってよ。
subtitles.english: High, go through. High, please go through.

subtitles.original: やった、やったー。おーん、て言いながら、ハイにする...
subtitles.english: I did it, I did it. Saying "On", then choosing High...

subtitles.original: あれ? ねえ、おかしいよね!
subtitles.english: Huh? Hey, that's weird, right!

subtitles.original: ハイ、とおったじゃん一回! 絶対おかしいよねこのゲーム!
subtitles.english: High went through once! This game is definitely weird!
